data.text: Guye loo ɠundiɠii nɔnɔi ʋe. Kolé mavofodaiti ta-wuyei.
À woilo dɛɛ nii ma, wo kpein nuɓusɛiti,
ɓolomadɔɠɔiti ta nu wolaiti,
Ɠima ɓɔɛiti ta ɠulazu dàaʋɛ.
Gòilogɛ ɠima vaalaaliiti ma,
Leeni vaa zu nà lua maanɔɠɔ voloiti ba,
Ta-zɔlɔɔgi ɠa ti laai da,
Nu nɔpɛ ge la zooga é ʋa bɔɔla unmɔɔ.
Mazɔlɔɔ ti-yɛnvui unmɔɔ salai wola ɓaaʋɛ.
Ta ɠisiɛzu ga ta yɛ vulua eyɛsu ɠɔ,
Ɗa ɠima nui ɠaazu, é za,
Anɛɛ ni ti-laaseigiti pɛɛʋɛ ta-yooiti ba,
Kɛlɛ nui nii unfema wolai bɛ, naa zii zu la ɠooza ɲɛgɛlɛin,
Wɛlɛ fai ʋa, seiɗai naati tuɠɔ, niiti ti laazu ti la, ta-litigi zu,
Ta ti laaʋilisu gɔvɛalaazu eɠɛ baala kpulugi,
Kɛlɛ GALA ka zɛ̀nvui unmɔɔ, é kùla gɔvɛalaazu,
Mina yiizoolɛ, siɛgi zu nui ta ɓɛtɛzu la,
mazɔlɔɔ é la lia ga tanɔpɛ a ɠɛna zaa,
Toɠa ɓɔɠɔ leve ga undaanɛɛʋɛ ná-eteai zu.
Kɛni é ʋilɛ mɛmɛwolani polu, ti zaai,
Nui nii unfemai bɛ, kɛlɛ ɠi ge la ma,
